channel.title: FOSS on Bits and Bytes from random blocks
channel.description: Recent content in FOSS on Bits and Bytes from random blocks

item.title: Experience at PuneFOSS'23
item.description: How it started ? A few days ago, as you may know, I attended MumbaiFOSS. I actually booked tickets for both Mumbai and Pune FOSS events because the reason behind booking both was that whatever I learned from MumbaiFOSS, I could apply in PuneFOSS. I didn’t want to just be an attendee at events. It felt weird to just go and listen, attend and get a couple of swags. I was already familiar with public speaking, as I had given introductory talks on Brain Chips in my class and in competitions.
